0.1.0beta.name: connect20/Netzarbeiter_CustomerActivation
0.1.0beta.description: This small extension makes it impossible for a customer to log in to magento until the account has been activated in the adminhtml interface.

suggest.magento-hackathon\/magento-composer-inst: Allows to manage this package as a dependency
